name: Dead Blues Walking
description:
Our entry for the BeansJam Mobile 2018. 

Trapped at an abandoned funfair you have to use the power of your instruments to blast away hords of zombies. 

Controls:

Tap on screen to shoot notes at zombies.

Tapping on the carrousel will turn it 180 degree.

On the upper right corner you can activate a special trumpet attack with cooldown.

Web:

You can also play it online: https://dev.wildfuchs-ia.de/DeadBluesWalking/index.html
